page.title: 16FASHION IN THE EIGHTIES
page.content: Fashion today is forever changing.The current trend is towards baggy clothes whereas earlier in 1985{ski-pants}were all the rage. Ski-pants are very tight trousers with elastic to hold them down at the ankles .There are three types of ski-pants, waffled, crinkled, and plain.{Bat-wing jumpers,}jumpers which have baggy arm-holes, are worn with the ski-pants. Another recent outfit has been the{jump-suit.}A jump-suit is an all in one suit.They are manufactured in a variety of colours and styles, most with baggy trouser-legs and sleeves. Shoes with small and thin heels,{stiletto-shoes;} large dangley{ear-rings; neck-laces with big beads are worn as accessories with the clothes of today.
